article.Heading: GST-60 Days Report Card: Here's what state FMs, representatives & experts anticipate
article.Summary: The goods and services tax (GST) council is meeting today for the third time since the rollout of the new tax regime. Timsy Jaipuria of CNBC-TV18 is in Hyderabad tracking the meeting and she spoke to a whole host of state finance ministers and representatives to gauge what to expect today.
article.Body:
The goods and services tax (GST) council is meeting today for the third time since the rollout of the new tax regime.

Hyderabad is the venue -- what's on the agenda? -- Tax rates on over 70 manufacturing goods and over 20 services could come under review. The top focus will be on the proposed higher cess on luxury cars.

In fact, the cess will not only impact luxury cars and sport utility vehicles (SUVs) but also midsized cars. So, the council could create a different category for midsized cars and not tax them at higher rates.

CNBC-TV18 also understands from sources that this higher cess could be postponed after the upcoming festive season.

Timsy Jaipuria and Nithya Balakrishnan of CNBC-TV18 are in Hyderabad tracking the meeting and she spoke to a whole host of state finance ministers and representatives to gauge what to expect today.

Watch accompanying videos of CNBC-TV18's special coverage 'GST - 60 Days Report Card' for more views and details from tax gurus and experts on what is on the agenda.
